column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////This is a great spot to get your fix for noodles. The best time to go is during the week right before lunch time. Not only does it get busy
column2: but there is also very little restaurant space. With a tight squeeze and poor cellular reception
column3: this wouldn't be a good place if you aren't a social person. Despite all of the negative aspects of the restaurant
column4: the food itself is amazing! Fresh garlic and toppings make your ramen experience specialized to you. I would definitely come here again.
